channel.title: Runescape Wilderness Ditch
channel.description:
Today, Jagex got so fed up with luring they build a ditch you have to jump over
Up at the border to the Wilderness you will notice a small change this week. Far too easily have people mistakenly entered the dangerous lands of the north and so, with spades-united, a ditch has been dug! You will now find that to enter and exit the wilderness you have to hop over a small ditch (no Agility level required). There's a safe zone just north of the ditch, so you needn't worry about getting over the ditch quickly. Careful you don't trip!
Please post your opion and vote! NO FLAMING Personaly, I think it's stupid, cause now you can be wasted easier, and you can't lure ppl (One of my main $$$ makers) and you have to double click it to jump it.I hope theres a major glitch and the wild suddley turns onto the wrong side, and thousands of ppl die.That, my friends, would be funny. Click here to see image of me and "The Ditch of Death" [url=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=newwildia5.png][img=http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8824/newwildia5.th.png][/url]

item.title: Runescape Wilderness Ditch
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

shpoanator:

[sarcasm] That’s a pretty big ditch of death. I don’t think I’d be able to jump over that. [/sarcasm]

[sarcasum] shame we don’t have to have 98 agiltity to get over it [/sarcasum]

We can’t go though it (use our magic skills to make essence that blows up!), we can’t go round it, we can’t go over it (or can we? construct a bridge!)

item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

[quote=“Dell451, post:1, topic:81661”]Today, Jagex got so fed up with luring they build a ditch you have to jump over

[quote]Up at the border to the Wilderness you will notice a small change this week. Far too easily have people mistakenly entered the dangerous lands of the north and so, with spades-united, a ditch has been dug!

You will now find that to enter and exit the wilderness you have to hop over a small ditch (no Agility level required). There’s a safe zone just north of the ditch, so you needn’t worry about getting over the ditch quickly.

Careful you don’t trip!
[/quote]

Please post your opion and vote!
NO FLAMING

Personaly, I think it’s stupid, cause now you can be wasted easier, and you can’t lure ppl (One of my main $$$ makers) and you have to double click it to jump it.I hope theres a major glitch and the wild suddley turns onto the wrong side, and thousands of ppl die.That, my friends, would be funny.

Click here to see image of me and “The Ditch of Death”
[img=http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8824/newwildia5.th.png][/quote]GJ editing that Phat in.

Other than that. I like the gap.

item.title: Runescape Wilderness Ditch
item.dc:creator: @Tuxy Tuxy
item.description:
@Tuxy wrote:

Everyone knew that luring was coming to it’s end. It’s all about backstabbing now, or wildness-to-wildness luring. Cracking is slowly dying out and now luring will follow. It’s somthing we are all going to have to live with.

You want a money maker? Get 600k, buy RS Demon, cut 2k yew logs, transfer, buy another and so on. You’ll make fast and easy cash without even having to type and get annoyed with your killer going Afk as they come.

Read full topic
